{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Tenda |model=W307R |revision=3 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date=2013 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=China only |type=wireless router |fcc_id= |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM5357C0 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu1_cores= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |cpu2_cores= |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=GigaDevice |fla1_model=GD25Q16BSIG |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM6A9160TSA-5G |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, internal,, 4-pad header |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM5357C0 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=none |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=Tenda_XXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^Tenda_[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=C8:3A:35 |oui_eth=C8:3A:35 }} ''Wireless N300 Router''
[http://www.tendacn.com/tendacn/Product/show.aspx?productid=381 Product page]
:[http://www.tendacn.com/tendacn/DownLoads/show.aspx?downid=1638 Latest English firmware V5.07.46_en] "10013665", and "V1.1" is silkscreened on the board. The default SSID pattern appears to be '''Tenda-XXXXX'''. This device is the same as Tenda W308R v.2.. but with a green bottom, instead. ==Images== File:Tenda_w307r_broadcom.jpeg|bottom side File:Tenda_w307r_broadcom_inside.jpg|inside File:Tenda_w307r_broadcom_SoC.jpg|Broadcom BCM5357C0 SoC File:Tenda_w307r_broadcom_flash.jpeg|Flash 2MB (GD25Q16BSIG / 25Q16BSIG) File:Tenda_w307r_broadcom_RAM.jpg|RAM 16MB [[Has images::internal| ]][[Has images::label| ]]
